name: KOMice
description:
Catch mice and battle them to collected their genes. Collected mice can be processed and turned into medicine. 

This was an experiment testing Unirx.  source: https://github.com/neuecc/UniRx

Thoughts on Unirx:
  • -its use to task/ async processed is marvelous and easy to use
  • -you can customize reactive properties in the inspector
  • -its biggest uptake is it saves RAM
downside:
  • -sometimes you can get so focused on the coding and new language you miss the basic/ obvious methods without using uniRx that may actually be more effective
  • -it can be hard to connect game system if half is uniRx and half isn't

Just for the sake of simplicity, Arrow keys to move and TAB to interact.
